empty.message:
Oooops!
No analytics data was downloaded for the start and end dates.
Please try adjusting the start and end dates.

sessions.description: Analytics of the unique visitors and application downloads.

performance.description: Analytics of the performance of the application and pages

locations.description: Analytics of the locations of the application visitors

browsers.description: Analytics of the browsers and devices used to load and view the application

headlines.sessions: Visitors via Website vs Downloaded App

loaded.average: The average # seconds it takes to download and render the App
loaded.min: The minimum # seconds it takes to download and render the App
loaded.max: The maximum # seconds it takes to download and render the App

downloaded.average: The average # seconds it takes to download the App
downloaded.min: The minimum # seconds it takes to download the App
downloaded.max: The maximum # seconds it takes to download the App

rendered.average: The average # seconds it takes to render the App
rendered.min: The minimum # seconds it takes to load the App
rendered.max: The maximum # seconds it takes to load the App

viewsize.headline: View Sizes
viewsize.description: The width and height of the browser or the app container

screensize.headline: Screen Sizes
screensize.description: The width and height of the device used to view the app

page.headline: Pages
page.description: The most and least viewed pages or sections of the app

website.headline: Websites
website.description: # times the App was loaded in a Browser

pwa.headline: PWAs
pwa.description: # times the App was loaded as an App

time_zone.headline: Time Zones
time_zone.description: The time zones of all the visitors to the app

country.headline: Countries
country.description: The countries of all the visitors to the app

region.headline: Regions
region.description: The regions, states, or provinces of all the visitors to the app

name.headline: Browsers
name.description: The browsers with which visitors view the website or app

engine_name.headline: Browser Engines
engine_name.description: The browser engines with which visitors view the website or app

device_vendor.headline: Device Manufacturers
device_vendor.description: The manufacturers of the devices with which visitors view the website or app

device_model.headline: Device
device_model.description: The devices with which visitors view the website or app

device_type.headline: Device Type
device_type.description: The type of devices with which visitors view the website or app

operating_system_name.headline: Operating System
operating_system_name.description: The operating systems of the devices with which visitors view the website or app
